title: Actenum Signs Agency Agreement for Argentina
text: Actenum Signs Agency Agreement for Argentina Tuesday, September 8, 2015 Vancouver, BC, September 8, 2015--(T-Net)-- Actenum Corporation , a Canadian software company providing operational scheduling and optimization solutionsto the oil & gas industry, and Impronta IT S.A., an Argentinian enterprisesolution provider, today announced the signing of an exclusive agencyagreement. Under the terms of the agreement, Impronta IT will promote and sellActenum's solutions—and provide technical support to Actenum clients—in the Argentine Republic. Impronta IT's professional services team will alsoparticipate in the implementation of Actenum solutions as they are deployedto regional clients. “We are very pleased to establish this relationship with Impronta,” saidPaul Maurer, Actenum CEO . “Our expertise in assisting oil & gas companieswith scheduling of complex operations, together with Impronta's capabilitiesin software development, deployment, and integration, will bring importantbenefits to regional clients.” Fernando Aliaga, Impronta IT S.A. Managing Director, said : “We are delightedto represent Actenum in Argentina. With our strong local businessrelationships, and the combination of their scheduling solutions and ourprofessional services capabilities, we anticipate success for both parties.” Company Snapshot
